name: NSMutableURLRequest
desc: A mutable URL load request that bridges to NSURLRequest and you use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

items.name: var cachePolicy: NSURLRequest.CachePolicy
items.desc: The request’s cache policy.

items.name: enum NSURLRequest.CachePolicy
items.desc: The constants used to specify interaction with the cached responses.

items.name: var httpMethod: String
items.desc: The HTTP request method.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL being requested.

items.name: var httpBody: Data?
items.desc: The request body.

items.name: var httpBodyStream: InputStream?
items.desc: The request body as an input stream.

items.name: var mainDocumentURL: URL?
items.desc: The main document URL.

items.name: var allHTTPHeaderFields: [String : String]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing all of the HTTP header fields for a request.

items.name: func addValue(String, forHTTPHeaderField: String)
items.desc: Adds a value to the header field.

items.name: func setValue(String?, forHTTPHeaderField: String)
items.desc: Sets a value for the header field.

items.name: var timeoutInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The request’s timeout interval, in seconds.

items.name: var httpShouldHandleCookies: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request should use the default cookie handling for the request.

items.name: var httpShouldUsePipelining: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request can continue transmitting data before receiving a response from an earlier transmission.

items.name: var allowsCellularAccess: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether a connection can use the device’s cellular network (if present).

items.name: var allowsConstrainedNetworkAccess: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether connections may use the network when the user has specified Low Data Mode.

items.name: var allowsExpensiveNetworkAccess: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether connections may use a network interface that the system considers expensive.

items.name: var networkServiceType: NSURLRequest.NetworkServiceType
items.desc: The network service type of the connection.

items.name: enum NSURLRequest.NetworkServiceType
items.desc: Constants that specify how a request uses network resources.

items.name: func bind(to: NEHotspotHelperCommand)
items.desc: Binds a URL request to the network interface associated with the hotspot helper command instance.

items.name: var attribution: NSURLRequest.Attribution
items.desc: The entity that initiates the network request.

items.name: enum NSURLRequest.Attribution
items.desc: The entities that can make a network request.
